articles.title: Why Lucid (LCID) Stock Is Falling Today
articles.mainIdea: Why Lucid (LCID) Stock Is Falling Today
articles.summary: StockStory: Why Lucid (LCID) Stock Is Falling Today. Shares of luxury electric car manufacturer Lucid (NASDAQ:LCID) fell 4.4% in the morning session after prominent market commentator Jim Cramer recommended investors sell the stock.

articles.title: Is Lucid Group Stock a Buy Now?

articles.summary: Motley Fool: Is Lucid Group Stock a Buy Now?. Lucid is making some key progress with its autonomous driving platform. Is it enough to make the stock a buy? Related tickers mentioned: NVDA, TSLA, UBER.
